channel.title: Emote/animation list?
channel.description:
At the moment im trying to find a list with animations and emotes (for players Why? cause i want to replace the animations for swords,with the real slashing emote, not that dart throwing crap :rolleyes:
iv searched on the forum search thingy for animation list,and emote list,and i dont get any usefull threads.
So if you have anything that could help me,that would be great.
thanks for takeing your time to read this ;D
